shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.rari: Color Items in the actor sheet and sidebar based on its rarity
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.spel: Color Items in the sidebar that are Spells
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.feat: Color Items in the sidebar that are Features
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.rari: Choose what mode you want for this module
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.disa: Disable Rarity Color on the compendium
Apply this styling to the compendium can slowdown the loading of the compendium. You can now disable this if you want it.
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.rese: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.debu: Prints debug messages to the console
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.dialogs.rese: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.dialogs.nosy:
This system is not currently fully supported. This means that the module does not know how to best handle this system's items, but can still operate in a limited fashion.

You can configure the module's settings yourself, but it requires a bit of technical know-how.
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.dialogs.syst:
This system was previously not supported, but in an recent update it was added as a supported system!

Do you want to load this system's default Item Pile settings?
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.dialogs.menu: Set colors for item, spells and features
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.enab: Enable Color only as background and not text
Color the Backgrounds Items in the sidebar and the inventory instead the text
Enable Color on the image border
Enable Color on the image border on Items in the sidebar and the inventory
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.thre: Contrast threshold to control the resulting font color

Make sense only with 'Enable Color only as background and not text' enabled. Contrast threshold to control the resulting font color, float values from 0 to 1. Default is 0.5. It is use by default for all text without a rgba color background
shadow-tweaks-rarity-colors.setting.forc: Force to use the manual Contrast threshold to control the resulting font color

Make sense only with 'Enable Color only as background and not text' enabled. If enabled it will apply the Contrast threshold set on 'Contrast threshold to control the resulting font color' to all text even the one with a rgba background.
Force the alpha/opacity value on the rgba background color.

Make sense only with 'Enable Color only as background and not text' enabled. If enabled it will apply the alpha value on thi setting if is > 0 by default in all the backgrounds even the one with a rgba background. NOTE: The value '0' will disable this setting.

classFeatureTypes.name: Class Feature Types Colors
classFeatureTypes.hint: Customize the Class Feature Types Colors
